name: Bomb Bouncing Barry
description:
Bomb Bouncing Barry is an explosive 2D puzzle platformer about a character named Barry who solves all his problems with bombs. Featuring 4 levels.

Controls:
WASD (or arrow keys) to move
Left-click will throw a bomb at the direction you click

Installation instructions:
Unzip and open the .exe!

This is my first gamejam entry and so I'd really appreciate any feedback so I can make my next game better!
